description.value: You're practiced with using your venom in combat, allowing you to employ your venom at a moment's notice. Your @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Envenom]{Envenom} action doesn't trigger reactions that normally trigger on a manipulate action. Additionally, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Venom Draw]{Venom Draw} action.
